Ragk.title: Babylon Or Lawrence Kansas
Ragk.about:
Babylon Or Lawrence Kansas is 13 tracks mashed into one, in the interest of keeping form with what I'm ripping off.
contraktor.bandcamp.com/album/babylon-or-kansas-city-ii
I had months to work on this, and so I used months to do just that. This is the most extensive, interesting, and thought-out Ragk project I've ever done. Honestly, it might just be the most thought-out project I've ever done, period.
All sounds [except for the movie clip sample in the intro] on the album were recorded on or around my grandparents' farm, where I've been for the past 6-or-so months. They were edited [pretty heavily] with a demo version of FL Studio I was able to fit onto their junker PC. The sounds were recorded with a ZTE burner smartphone my grandmom bought for me. The album art is a collage of collages I did while here. I went so far as to have any non-collage objects [the phone, mountain dew, and ham in the bottom left, the bandana, the two American flags] run through a scanner alongside the actual collages. Individual collages as well as various other art I did come with the download of this album, so you should download it!

Ragk.title: Genetic Illness
Ragk.about:
cassettes by Skunt Productions:
skuntproductions.bandcamp.com/album/genetic-illness
Ragk.credits:
released July 1, 2022
A visceral unpacking of the realities of being raised by an abusive, manipulative parent with narcissistic tendencies: what it's like to be used as a tool to shackle your other parent in an abusive marriage, what it's like to watch younger siblings be brought into this world well after you know the realities of what inevitably also be their upbringing, watching the facade crumble as you become an adult, and the inevitably learned behavior that unavoidably was permanently planted into your mind. By being abused and manipulated your whole life, you are, against your will, given the tools to and taught how to manipulate others for your own gain, how to hurt those you love. Above all else, it is necessary torture to rip this from your head.
Picture your mother so focused on beating the fuck out of you that she's speeding down a busy city street, swerving between lanes, and about to run a red light. Picture feeling certain this is how and where you die before you've even finished middle school. Hurdling towards the intersection where 23rd St turns into Clinton Parkway in Lawrence, Kansas, I was ready to accept my fate.

Ragk.title: Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves I
Ragk.about:
spirit watching over me spirit watching over me spirit watching over me
i look out my wndow and for the 41st time i see the same car pass by. i inform the shadow on my back. we keep note. we keep note of this.
for a moment i feel myself come unplugged as i look acrossss the window i'm seated between panes of and see an image of a city skyline. it raises and raises and raises and stagnates there finally. it's a beautiful skyline,. they ruined the skyline. they ruined the skyline. they changed the skyline they changed it they changed it they changed it they changed it
i am not seeing the skyline nearby but the skyline of a city 101 miles away. they haven't changed it yet but plans have been set in motion to. it's public information but plenty of folks don't know it'll happen it. i wonder what will become of those who aren't prepared...

trackinfo.title: I Feel Something Intense Wash Over Me As I Realize How Much I Hate You
trackinfo.lyrics: you have everything i can't have. you are everything i can't be. admiration washes over into envy. idolization washes over into hate. what have i done different? why can't i be the woman i know i should be? i deserve it as much as you do. i deserve it as much as anyone. there was a time when i would comfort you when you were sad. now it just makes my blood boil. how dare you? how dare you have everything i've ever wanted and spit in my face, have an imperfect life? if even perfection is imperfect, what's the point of living? trouble in paradise. i feel something intense wash over me. there's not a fucking point. no matter what temporary happiness i may gain as i strive for the unobtainable, which is to say, to make myself in your image. i will always be a miserable little sack of envy and greed and hate and fear. you're as miserable as what i want to be as i am when i'm not.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves I, released April 24, 2019

trackinfo.title: Body Of An Off-Duty Police Officer
trackinfo.lyrics: sleep deprivation causes hallucinations. one of my most common is flashing lights in my periphery. you've got me on edge now. watch as i slam you off the road and take off. you have no idea how well i know this countryside.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves I, released April 24, 2019

trackinfo.title: For Now, I Just Want To Drown In This Ocean Of Carnal Desire
trackinfo.lyrics: fill my head with ideas. i am an object and a commodity. why is that idea regurgitated if it isn't true? why is my worthlessness vomited into my own mouth? i refuse to accept that it's because i willingly sit tongue out waiting for it. pornography is self harm. pornography is counterproductive. i will never be worth anything if no one wants to fuck me.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves I, released April 24, 2019

trackinfo.title: For Use
trackinfo.lyrics: as if i was fucking worth it.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves I, released April 24, 2019

Ragk.title: Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves II
Ragk.about:
between melancholy and mystery i collapse dead on this empty sky
black broken bone
confusion
shadows
some spirit truth whispers
winter is such an interesting season for light. the nights are so bright. city lights shine up into the dense grey clouds and shine back down. no light gets to escape up into space, the clouds make it prisoner here and illuminate all around. you could go outside at 1AM and see perfectly fine. you could drive without headlights.
i learned a long time ago to stop believing on coincidence. the deer around here seem to throw themselves in front of cars. my arms get cold every time i pass that house.
i feel like my guardian isn't here anymore. i don't know what to say to him to have him prove he's still there. i never learned how to talk.

trackinfo.title: Things I Can't Explain And Care Not To Find Explainations For
trackinfo.lyrics: you've proven to me time and time again that there's no such thing as a coincidence.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves II, released April 24, 2019

trackinfo.title: Things You Want But Don't Need
trackinfo.lyrics: i just wish someone could fuck some life into me. i just wish someone could fuck a soul into me. i just wish someone could fuck me. i want to be worth being used. i'm not worthless if i'm being used. wear me like skin. kill me if it means i can finally know what it's like to have a purpose. i just wish someone could fuck some life into me. i just wish someone could fuck a soul into me. i'm so full of constant, vivid emotion. i'm so fucking empty. i just wish someone would fuck me. don't look at me.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves II, released April 24, 2019

trackinfo.title: Things You Need But Don't Want
trackinfo.lyrics: i wish you'd stop telling me things i need to hear. i'd be just fine participating in self-destructive rituals of balled up crying depression and hate and fear and pain. hate and fear and pain. i never knew i didn't have to feel this way until you proved to me i could be happy. i wish i had never learned to be happy. maybe then i could've lived in ignorant bliss, bliss in that i might could convince myself miserableness is happiness. i could've been convinced.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves II, released April 24, 2019

trackinfo.title: The Voices In My Head Stopped Talking A Long Time Ago, But The Ones In Yours Bring Me Such Comfort
trackinfo.lyrics: thank you, i love you
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves II, released April 24, 2019

trackinfo.title: I'm Sorry I'm Sorry I'm Sorry I'm Sorry I'm Sorry I'm Sorry / Are You Mad At Me?
trackinfo.lyrics: for all you know i could be dying right now. i'd never tell you. i don't want to be a burden. everything fucking peachy. don't touch me. i can't imagine you'd ever want to touch me. why would you ever want to touch me? why would you ever want to love me? why did you ever love me? do you love me? don't touch me. it comes from a place of insincerity. you just feel bad. everyone just feels bad. pity magnet. pity magnet. pity magnet. dumpster fire.  i don't want your fucking pity. don't touch me. i'd be better off without you. you don't even know it yet but your life would be infinitely better without me. i am a burden. i bring you down. i ruin you. i am a drain, i suck the life and good and joy out of you. save it for those who deserve it. please come back to me. i am a parasite.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves II, released April 24, 2019

trackinfo.title: A House Party In Kansas City, Summer 2017
trackinfo.lyrics: you came so close to ruining me but i slipped just outside your grasp. i find it so ironic my only ally turned against me in the end. judas iscariot. would you have raped me if you could? would you have defiled me if you could? who else have you hurt? shower pictures i know of. but i'm a monster. i couldn't hurt a fly if i tried but i'm a monster. i'm so forgetful it would be so easy to convince things that happened never happened. i am a blank slate. i will believe whatever i am fed. i will rip myself inside out just to not look foolish. i am unaware of my surrounding and i am unaware of myself. i am the perfect target. i am victimhood personified.
trackinfo.credits: from Images Of City Skylines Collapsing In On Themselves II, released April 24, 2019

Ragk.title: INDIRECT MIRROR
Ragk.about: you already know everything about me by now, right?

trackinfo.title: Cognitohazard
trackinfo.lyrics: I've spoken about a lot of things over time. a lot of subjects, and more importantly a lot of events in my life. I drown the details in obscurity and distortion, but I feel increasingly both cowardly and disingenuous, and moreover I feel like I'm failing my own art by not discussing blatantly and bluntly about those subjects and events, and those thoughts, opinions, and experiences. when I started out with this, I sought to bring a unique viscerality to my power electronics by speaking about things that were happening directly and uniquely to me, about my direct life experience. in being so specific I backed myself into a corner. so we lay this bare today. I was born on April 24th, 2000 in Homewood, Alabama. my parents lived in Montevallo, mind you, but the hospital was in Homewood. when I was 2 years old, my dad was carrying me while trying not to slip on the ice covering the ground. he failed in this, falling hard on his back. I slammed the back of my skull on the concrete.

Ragk.title: MIC COUNTER REC/BATT WPC 1718
Ragk.about: As most of you know, all of my albums thus far have been edited on a computer one way or another. The harshness or the samples or the whatever have been computer based usually. Not this time. The only time a computer was involved in this was uploading it [and recording the actual audio I guess]. I went out and actually got myself some fuckin' pedals! I'm a real noise guy now! This is a series of experiments made with two guitar pedals and a cassette player that also acts as a microphone at times. Also including some of my first forays into power electronics!

Ragk.title: Someone Needs To Take My Knives Away From Me
Ragk.about:
"Let me see your wrist."
Why?
"You're hurting yourself, aren't you?"
Why are we having this conversation?
“I cannot believe you! After all this talking ME down from hurting MYself, here you are with cuts on your wrist!”
This isn’t any of your business.
“Why was my self harm your business?”
Because you MADE it my business! YOU came to ME for help. I am not coming to you. I don’t want help.
“Then why are the cuts on your wrists?”
…
“Why are the cuts on your wrists where everyone can see them, idiot?”
...
////////////////////////////////
I don't understand why no one talks to me.
"Do you talk to anyone?"
I talk to people. People don't talk to me. People don't initiate conversations.
"How many people do you initiate conversations with?"
Too many. I'm done talking to people if they don't talk to me first.
"Don't you think that it's a little hypocritical to complain about no one starting conversations if you yourself don't go start conversations? Why is that onus on them?"
I don't know, it's just... I don't know.
"Maybe you're just cursed with being more sociable than most folks."
Cursed is right.
////////////////////////////////
“You have to eat!”
I am eating!
“How many calories are you having a day?”
I don’t know! I don’t keep track of that stuff.
“Bull. Shit. I know you better than that.”
Like, 1000? Usually?
“A THOUSAND?? YOU’RE SUPPOSED TO HAVE TWICE THAT, AT LEAST!!”
It’s going to be worth it.
“Is this why you keep sitting down? Are you lightheaded? It’s unsafe, this is unsafe.”
I’ll be fine. I know what I’m fucking doing.
////////////////////////////////
"But you still gotta take care of yourself. It’s better to live it up for a longer amount of time than a shorter amount of time."
Taking care of myself is something for 24-year-old me, who's really really surprised and confused that she's still alive.
"My sister knows a lot about that"
I look up to her a lot. I look up to your sister a whole lot.
"There came a point when I realized staying alive is just easier than dying."
I'd have to, like, die. Being alive is my default state.
"Yeah."
////////////////////////////////
"You're a woman who was fucked over and needs love and support from people who love you."
Yeah, but once I grow and change and heal and become a strong, beautiful, confident woman, then what? I will have no purpose.
"What the fuck are you talking about?"
I mean, think about it. What happens when I'm done growing?
"Um, well..."
When I'm done changing, done improving, what then?
"You don't. You're going to be growing for a long ass time."
Well, then, if it doesn't end, what's the point?
"To stay alive and use your experiences to help others. If you've been through hell and survived it, why not stick around and give the younger women help? Why let that suffering go to waste?"
...
"I love you. You got this."
////////////////////////////////
“I’m sorry for blowing up on you about noticing your cuts on your wrist.”
It’s okay. I was being dumb.
“Are you still hurting yourself?”
...yes.
“It’s okay. I am too.”
I promise to never put you down for it again.
“Likewise.”

Ragk.title: Station
Ragk.about: A collection of field recording works that were fucked with. Noise and also dark ambient at points.
Ragk.credits:
released October 14, 2014
All noise by Ragk, an alias of Existence Cemetery.
Special thanks to Poète Maudit and the folks down at /r/noisemusic for giving me tips and encouragement.
Shout out to Poète Maudit, Pupae, faint glow, Contraktor and Peiiste for influencing/inspiring me.

trackinfo.title: Station
trackinfo.lyrics: Hey I've been alone for thirty years now It drives a feller insane to be alone for so long Hey How're you doing? I remember the last time I seen you Been 3 decades I haven't eaten in 30 years I haven't lived for 20 more When I ask you if you're ready to die I'm not trying to scare you It's a legitimate question Because if you're not ready I'm not gonna wait Ready or not... ...here I come
